reviews.review:
Es ist an sich ein super Spiel für jeden, der Survival und etwas Horror mag.

Am meisten Spaß macht es natürlich mit einem oder mehreren Freunden. Aber von der Mechanik und der Idee ist es Top. 
Man sollte aber auch bereit sein den ein oder anderen Bug hinzunehmen.

Игра не плоха, но иногда бывает сложна. Например, когда маньяк тунелит игрока, но это проблема не игры. Игра греет карточку, на моей RX470 температура поднимается до 71 градуса, с 50% вентиляторов. Советую. 9/10 подношений.
Игра мне понравилась, правда, совсеем не страашно, даже весело)

Das Game Dead by Daylight ist sehr einseitig es super surv sidded ist, wenn ihr das seht bevor ihr es kauft dann last euch gewarnt sein: das spiel ist surv sidded, verbugt, viele leute sind toxic af, machtmaking ist kacke, kein balancing und als surv eine runde zu finden dauert normalerweise so 5bis 15minuten XD. wenn ihr euch es trotzdem holt dann bitte seid nicht toxic oder einfach nur Salty noobs danke.

玩了挺久了，虽然不是经常玩，从黎明杀机刚出的时候就入坑了，那时候刚出护士，也只有汪涵，大张伟，双马尾，黑妹。那时候大张伟破坏手是最有用的技能，四个大张伟可以拆光全图除了地下室的钩子，那时候技能传承只能在血网里点到。那时候杀机在国内还很火，BHR被称为最有良心的工作室。知道杀机在国内被禁播了，直到网易罪恶的手伸向了这款游戏，抄出了第五人格这种耻辱。现在大家只有听到第五人格才会想起黎明杀机。

我真的很喜欢黎明杀机，这几乎是最好玩的非对称对抗游戏里。我爱黎明杀机，我会永远支持下去。
mega gierka juz za mna 20 godzin i sie nie nudzi

заходим в игру, выбираем за кого хотим играть, жмем поиск, ждем катку 5 минут - 10 минут, нашлась! ура, началось грузиться в лобби, ошибка, не загружается, заходи в диспетчер снимай задачу - по другому играть не смоожешь, так повторите раза 3 и примерно после этого загрузится катка, а если вы за маньяка играете то мало того что они дисбалансные в сторону выживших то ещё и каждую катку ливают либо хай ранги попадаются(когда вы 15 ранг вам попадаются 2-8 ранги)

I think we did a pretty good...job so far. KEKW

Things are mostly okay now. Playing with friends is still the best thing to do as too many players (not the majority of course) still seem to be hellbent on ruining the experience for others with toxicity - take your pic. 

It is not helping that Bhvr makes some changes here or there that seem to make no sense. That Leatherface can go with his chainsaw for a super long time makes it almost impossible to get away. Just an example.

On the other hand the map changes really have been great lately. And now they are testing the game without Bloodlust, in hopes of getting rid of it or changing it so that players, especially the bad ones, don't have such a crutch available anymore.

Lets hope the changes continue for the good, bugs get squashed and perhaps more game modes etc in the future. Because a bit of variety would be nice as things do get boring after some time.

Divertido, mas talvez enjoativo por ser repetitivo, e por problemas que gera muitas polêmicas... Como balanceamento (tipo o do billy que é bem polêmico), algum problema com cheater (esses ultimos meses teve uma chuva de cheater, que graças a deus deu uma diminuida). mas é legal.

ゲームは良いが運営のバランス調整がダメなゲーム
サバイバーは初心者向けで調整し、キラーは上級者向けに調整をしたせいでキラーはナーフに次ぐナーフより弱体化し続けています。キラーをメインでプレイしてきましたが、Ver3.5.0のパークの破滅ナーフでもう限界です。
バグも多くマッチングバグも全然治らなくキラーでプレイするとほぼ格上のサバイバーにしかマッチしません。
色々なゲームをプレイしてきたがここまで酷い開発はないでしょう。

I like this game! I think there's a bit of a learning curve, a lot of people have played for a really long time and so you might fight a killer that has a ton of knowledge of the game and a really built up killer, and then you'll get murdered by them. And it's kind of the same when playing the Killer, because you could have survivors who really know how to stall out or play the game and then you can lose trying to fight them. There's one element of this game that's really rough and that's teachable perks, because to make killers really effective you need a few DLC perks, and you have to level up your killers to 30 at least before you can teach them. I haven't spent that much time on the game, but I've only unlocked two teachable perks in 50 hours. it's a pretty harsh grind. 

That being said, I really recommend this game. It's super fun to play as the killer, even if you lose, you still can usually get at least one survivor or two. Plus it's super fun to play with friends if you're a survivor or even on your own. There are a lot of different ways to play and ultimately the stakes are never to high so losses don't hurt terribly. You get a lot of points most of the time, and that lets you level up pretty consistently. Overall, I'd totally get it :)

The game itself is really exciting. Not only are you trying to survive the killer, but you have to be strategic about ways to do it. The main goal of the game is to repair a total of 5 generators, and find the exit. The game also enables players to purchase characters, Outfits and perks, which gives us more flexibility to personally customize our survivor(s). Overall the games actually really fun, and its even more exciting playing with friends or just finding a survivor to team up with:). One issue i had though was a bit of lag, but over time it reduced

Expected some kind of Friday the 13th non engaging game that is simply for playing with friends. And I got something weird. Let's start with sentence that Dead by Daylight is high skill capped game but with limited content. The only "gamemode" in this game is for Survivor "Do 5 gens (that require a skill check [spiny thing with limited place to hit space to succeed] and open one of two gates to escape" pretty simple but replayability is amazing 90% of the time you will get different map different killer to go against different position of the gens etc. For killer the goal is simple "Kill 4 survivors either by hooking them 3 times or via mori or by bleeding out on the ground. Let's take a look on DBD with pros and cons method :

PROS : 
+Replayability
+High skill cap
+Many survivors with lots of different perks 
+A bit less killers but each with their own unique power perks and add ons that sometimes change how power is working
+Great play with friends game
+Wonderful maps
+Great killers and survivors from various popular horror movies or amazing killers/survivors made by the devs solely.
+Killers like Freddy Michael Myers Demogorgon Ghostface Leatherface and others that bring so much climate.

CONS :
-Lot of grind required to buy most characters with in game currency and still there are killers/survivors that require actual money.
-Overpriced skins
-Lots of grind to have the perks that are meta (you might think it's good but without some perks you can be highly underpowered compared to your "rich" mates
-Often suspicious hit boxes that can get you killed without your fault.
-Easy to get bullied as killer
-No balance survivors are stronger than killers
-Forced ranking system (no normal games)
-No rewards for ranking up only "reward" you get is number in main menu (other survivors don't see your rank since last updates) harder games and longer queues
-Ranking system is broken what results in stupid matchmaking where rank 1 (highest) can get killer with 11 rank (middle rank)
-Devs focusing only on survivors having fun with their patches

Final thoughts : Despite the cons the game is for sure worth buying and checking out. It can be best game you ever played yet the worst and most frustrating thanks to bugs. I must say since 2016 devs did PRETTY GOOD JOB SO FAR. 2/10 got face camped and later bullied by survivors ended up crying to my pillow.
